Geography: Country of Origin Egypt, Middle Egypt, el-Amarna (Akhetaten); inc. el-Hagg Qandil, Royal Palace of Akhenaten, Petrie 1891–1892
Provenance: Petrie excavations 1891–1892. Acquired by Petrie in the division of finds. Acquired by Lord Amherst for his support. Purchased by Lord Carnarvon at the Amherst Sale, Sotheby's, 1921. Purchased by the museum with the Carnarvon Collection from Almina, Countess of Carnarvon, 1926.
